title: NLTK (Natural Language Toolkit)
description: Comprehensive Python library for tokenization, tagging, parsing, classification and semantic reasoning

title: spaCy
description: High‑performance industrial‑grade NLP in Python: tokenization, NER, parsing, text classification

title: Hugging Face Transformers
description: Library of transformer‑based models and Hub of pre‑trained NLP models

title: Gensim
description: Efficient topic modelling, word2vec/doc2vec and document similarity toolkit

title: Spark NLP
description: Scalable NLP built on Apache Spark: sentiment, NER, embeddings & pipelines

title: Stanford CoreNLP
description: Java‑based suite for tokenization, parsing, NER, coreference, sentiment analysis

title: Rasa NLU & Core
description: Open‑source framework for building conversational agents and dialogue management

title: TextBlob
description: Beginner‑friendly Python NLP library for sentiment, part‑of‑speech tagging, translation

title: Apache OpenNLP
description: Java toolkit for sentence detection, tokenization, POS tagging, parsing and coreference

title: LangChain
description: Framework for LLM‑based apps: document summarization, chatbots, retrieval‑augmented generation
